courses.name: Beginner Guitar Course
courses.title: Learn Guitar from Scratch
courses.description: This course is designed for beginners who want to start playing the guitar. You'll learn chords, strumming patterns, and simple songs.

courses.name: Piano Essentials
courses.title: Master Piano Basics
courses.description: Start your piano journey with this comprehensive course covering scales, chords, and basic music theory.

courses.name: Advanced Music Theory
courses.title: Deep Dive into Harmony and Composition
courses.description: Explore advanced concepts in music theory including chord progressions, modes, and songwriting techniques.

courses.name: Music Production with FL Studio
courses.title: Create Beats and Tracks Like a Pro
courses.description: Learn how to use FL Studio for music production. This course covers beat making, mixing, and exporting your own music.

courses.name: Vocal Training Bootcamp
courses.title: Improve Your Voice and Singing Technique
courses.description: Enhance your vocal range, tone, and breathing techniques with this professional vocal training course.
